member.name: T:AppointMate.CompanyType
member.summary: Provides enumeration over the company types

member.name: F:AppointMate.CompanyType.InformationTechnology
member.summary: Companies in this category focus on developing and providing software, hardware, and technology-related services. This includes software development companies, IT consulting firms, cybersecurity providers, and cloud computing services.

member.name: F:AppointMate.CompanyType.SoftwareAndTechnology
member.summary: This category encompasses companies that specifically focus on software development and technology solutions, which may not be limited to traditional IT services. It includes companies developing applications, mobile apps, gaming software, and emerging technologies like artificial intelligence and virtual reality.

member.name: F:AppointMate.CompanyType.FinanceAndBanking
member.summary: Companies in the finance sector include banks, credit unions, investment firms, insurance companies, and other financial institutions. They provide financial services such as banking, investment management, lending, and insurance.

member.name: F:AppointMate.CompanyType.CoffeeAndBeverage
member.summary: This category covers companies in the food and beverage industry, specifically those involved in coffee production, distribution, and retail. It includes coffee roasters, cafes, coffeehouse chains, and beverage manufacturers.

member.name: F:AppointMate.CompanyType.HealthcareAndPharmaceuticals
member.summary: Companies in this category focus on providing healthcare services, pharmaceutical products, medical equipment, and healthcare technology solutions.

member.name: F:AppointMate.CompanyType.ConstructionAndEngineering
member.summary: Companies in this sector are involved in construction projects, infrastructure development, and engineering services.
